page.title: 17MEDIA RAFFORD AREA
page.content: Out of the house we covered there were 100 radios in working order, 57 televisions with 4 houses having Oracle and Ceefax. There were only 4 CB radios and 14 video recorders. The most popular paper read was The Press and Journal with 20 readers, then the Radio Times with 12 and the Nortern Scot with 10. 3 people read the Sun and Daily Record while the Daily Express was read by only 2.Only a few people read the local Forres Gazette.The most popular magazine was the Woman's Weekly with 6 households buying it regularly.The People's Friend was read by 4 while She,Flight,Punch Reader's Digest,Home and Fishing were read by only 1 household.
